程序包 org.apache.shardingsphere.data.pipeline.core.context

接口 InventoryIncrementalJobItemContext

  • 所有超级接口:
    PipelineJobItemContext, PipelineJobProgressListener
    public interface InventoryIncrementalJobItemContext
extends PipelineJobItemContext, PipelineJobProgressListener
    Inventory incremental job item context.
